title: Delete Champions -- Riot
body: In a old post, there was a topic that if you didn't like some of your champions, you could send a ticket to Riot and ask them to delete the champions for you (No refund). Does this still work?

replies.body: You can reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look at your specific issue individually.  We may be able to remove champions from your account, but you will need to[ verify ownership](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) of your account and confirm that no refunds would be provided.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Hi Porocles, if I needed to delete some champions, how would I format the support ticket? Which category would I choose?
General I have a league of legends question is fine!  We'll get you to the right place!
Is this posible for skins also?I have a lot cheap skins on my main acc that I got through the mistery gifting.I will never used them, so can u just delete them?
We can look into that for you!  Similarly, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can personally check out your specific case.  Thanks!
